project: Launch Smoke Test: Add Launch Mode Usage Section to README
description: Add a minimal README section describing launch mode usage with examples and workflow details

context.currentState: README documents spec, plan, build, and product modes but launch mode (one-shot pipeline) is missing from documentation. Users don't have clear guidance on when to use launch vs spec->build workflow.
context.targetState: README includes comprehensive launch mode documentation with quick start examples, workflow explanation, launch defaults, and guidance on when to use launch vs manual workflow.
constraints: Launch mode is new functionality combining product(optional)->spec->build in one command
Documentation must cover: basic usage, examples, defaults, when to use, dependencies
Updates needed across multiple files: README, RALPH_LOOP_REF.md, completions
